Description: Blue glazed composition reis shabti of Ns-t3-nb-t3wy with black painted detail: a striated lappet-wig, a modelled face with traced eyes and one hand held across the chest in relief holding a whip; the triangular apron is inscribed with black painted Hieroglyphs.
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1994 Jan-Mar, Doncaster Museum & Art Gallery, Ancient Egypt
Acquisition name: Donated by: Government of the British Protectorate of Egypt
